TopicTitle: Please raise seats on MK1 Command module so we would be able to use viewing ports.

Articles.Content:
The two pilots on command module have viewing ports above their heads, those windows would be invaluable in docking process. If Kerbal engineers would be so kind to give us ability to raise pilot's seat a bit higher so he could stare directly into the front looking window. A targeting reticule for increased precision, mounted into the windows would be also welcome. For other modules it would be nice to add "periscopes" for similar tasks.

Thank you.
You can click on the windows to look out them from closer up
Well, that was embarrassing. Thank you for your response.

Already exists, it seems. Closing.

Hmm. We really need to get some kind of a basic 'first-use' tutorial that can be disabled in the settings, so that whenever you get into a certain situation, it tells you different control options. A bit of text across the top or bottom of the screen would work wonders for learning the oft-forgotten VAB controls and for other obscure things like this.
